attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE THE UNDERSIGNED CALL UPON THE PRIME MINISTER TO BRING TO THE ATTENTION OF THE CHANCELLOR OF THE EXCHEQUER AND THE GOVERNMENT THIS PETITION, AND THEN CONSIDER THE TAXATION OF CARAVANS WHICH SHOULD BE MADE TO PAY VEHICLE EXCISE DUTY AT 50% OF ANY VEHICLE WHICH  TOWS A CARAVAN THE REASON BEING THEY ADD TO ROAD CONGESTION AND SHOULD BE CLASSED AS ANOTHER VEHICLE ON OUR ROADS.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
